## **Basic Time Series Models**

---

### Manually Generate Time Series Data

```{r a, comment=NA, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.height=6, fig.width=9}

n = 500
w = rnorm(n, sd = .25)


x.t = 0

for (i in 2:n) {
  x.t[i] = x.t[i-1] + w[i]
}

plot.ts(x.t)

```
